themes: Lack of artist agency in review process
Poor city communication and missed deadlines
key_phrases: most of the artists that I work with just didn't understand how to answer them
being more shut out of the review process
before artists were able to present in front of a panel to clarify information
panel discussions aren't even viewable by artists
given artists less and less agency
City is notoriously bad at communications
missing deadlines that they set for themselves
barriers_identified: Lack of understanding of application process among artists
Exclusion from review and panel processes
Lack of transparency in panel discussions
solutions_proposed: Allow artists to present in front of review panels
Make panel discussions viewable to artists
